short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copliancy allows users, the nation’s leading license renewal and compliance platform to access and update their user portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copliancy Chrome Extension is a extension that allows users of Copliancy, the nation’s leading license renewal and compliance platform to access and update their user portal. Users are able to look up licenses and permits they own which are associated to their restaurants, hotels, gas stations, movie theaters and more. From the portal users can update their information and mark license renewals as paid.
